publicClasses.brief: A discard_block_engine adapts an existing base random number engine and produces random values by discarding some of the values returned by its base engine. Each cycle of the compound engine begins by returning r values successively produced by the base engine and ends by discarding p-r such values. The engine's state is the state of its base engine followed by the number of calls to operator() that have occurred since the beginning of the current cycle.
publicClasses.name: random::discard_block_engine
publicClasses.summary: A discard_block_engine adapts an existing base random number engine and produces random values by discarding some of the values returned by its base engine. Each cycle of the compound engine begins by returning r values successively produced by the base engine and ends by discarding p-r such values. The engine's state is the state of its base engine followed by the number of calls to operator() that have occurred since the beginning of the current cycle.
publicClasses.title: random::discard_block_engine

publicClasses.brief: A linear_congruential_engine random number engine produces unsigned integer random numbers using a linear congruential random number generation algorithm.
publicClasses.name: random::linear_congruential_engine
publicClasses.summary: A linear_congruential_engine random number engine produces unsigned integer random numbers using a linear congruential random number generation algorithm.
publicClasses.title: random::linear_congruential_engine

publicClasses.brief: A linear_feedback_shift_engine random number engine produces unsigned integer random values using a linear feedback shift random number generation algorithm.
publicClasses.name: random::linear_feedback_shift_engine
publicClasses.summary: A linear_feedback_shift_engine random number engine produces unsigned integer random values using a linear feedback shift random number generation algorithm.
publicClasses.title: random::linear_feedback_shift_engine

publicClasses.brief: A normal_distribution random number distribution produces floating point Normally distributed random numbers.
publicClasses.name: random::normal_distribution
publicClasses.summary: A normal_distribution random number distribution produces floating point Normally distributed random numbers.
publicClasses.title: random::normal_distribution

publicClasses.brief: A subtract_with_carry_engine random number engine produces unsigned integer random numbers using the subtract with carry algorithm of Marsaglia & Zaman.
publicClasses.name: random::subtract_with_carry_engine
publicClasses.summary: A subtract_with_carry_engine random number engine produces unsigned integer random numbers using the subtract with carry algorithm of Marsaglia & Zaman.
publicClasses.title: random::subtract_with_carry_engine

publicClasses.brief: A uniform_int_distribution random number distribution produces signed or unsigned integer uniform random numbers from a given range.
publicClasses.name: random::uniform_int_distribution
publicClasses.summary: A uniform_int_distribution random number distribution produces signed or unsigned integer uniform random numbers from a given range.
publicClasses.title: random::uniform_int_distribution

publicClasses.brief: A uniform_real_distribution random number distribution produces floating point uniform random numbers from a half-open interval.
publicClasses.name: random::uniform_real_distribution
publicClasses.summary: A uniform_real_distribution random number distribution produces floating point uniform random numbers from a half-open interval.
publicClasses.title: random::uniform_real_distribution

publicClasses.brief: An xor_combine_engine adapts two existing base random number engines and produces random values by combining the values produced by each.
publicClasses.name: random::xor_combine_engine
publicClasses.summary: An xor_combine_engine adapts two existing base random number engines and produces random values by combining the values produced by each.
publicClasses.title: random::xor_combine_engine

publicTypes.brief: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements a version of the Minimal Standard random number generation algorithm.
publicTypes.name: minstd_rand0
note: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type minstd_rand0 shall produce the value 1043618065 .
publicTypes.summary: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements a version of the Minimal Standard random number generation algorithm.
publicTypes.title: minstd_rand0

publicTypes.brief: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements a version of the Minimal Standard random number generation algorithm.
publicTypes.name: minstd_rand
note: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type minstd_rand shall produce the value 399268537 .
publicTypes.summary: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements a version of the Minimal Standard random number generation algorithm.
publicTypes.title: minstd_rand

publicTypes.brief: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements the base engine of the ranlux24 random number engine.
publicTypes.name: ranlux24_base
note: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type ranlux24_base shall produce the value 7937952 .
publicTypes.summary: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements the base engine of the ranlux24 random number engine.
publicTypes.title: ranlux24_base

publicTypes.brief: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements the base engine of the ranlux48 random number engine.

note: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type ranlux48_base shall produce the value 192113843633948 .
publicTypes.summary: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements the base engine of the ranlux48 random number engine.
publicTypes.title: ranlux48_base

publicTypes.brief: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements the RANLUX level-3 random number generation algorithm.
publicTypes.name: ranlux24
note: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type ranlux24 shall produce the value 9901578 .
publicTypes.summary: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements the RANLUX level-3 random number generation algorithm.
publicTypes.title: ranlux24

publicTypes.brief: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements the RANLUX level-4 random number generation algorithm.

note: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type ranlux48 shall produce the value 88229545517833 .
publicTypes.summary: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements the RANLUX level-4 random number generation algorithm.
publicTypes.title: ranlux48

publicTypes.brief: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements L'Ecuyer's 1996 three-component Tausworthe random number generator.
publicTypes.name: taus88
note: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type taus88 shall produce the value 3535848941 .
publicTypes.summary: A random number engine with predefined parameters which implements L'Ecuyer's 1996 three-component Tausworthe random number generator.
publicTypes.title: taus88

publicTypes.title: default_random_engine
